text: Edisto Beach is a town in Colleton County, South Carolina, United States. In 2020, 1,033 people lived there. Edisto Beach was formed by the Edistow Indians and was discovered by the Spanish in the late 1500s. Edisto Beach is located at (32.487613, -80.324402). ==References== ==Other websites== *Edisto Beach Information Category:Towns in South Carolina Category:1500s establishments in North America
title: Edisto Beach, South Carolina
